verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> [was] eight שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> Josiah בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> and thirty וְאַחַת֙ <WH259> one שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> and walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <WH1870> in the ways דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not סָ֖ר <WH5493> and declined יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> [neither] to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> nor to the left

וּבִשְׁמוֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> For in the eighth שָׁנִ֜ים <WH8141> year לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <WH4427> of his reign וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was still נַ֔עַר <WH5288> while he was yet young הֵחֵ֕ל <WH2490> he began לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> after the God דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וּבִשְׁתֵּ֧ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> year הֵחֵל֙ <WH2490> he began לְטַהֵ֔ר <WH2891> to purge אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> from the high places וְהָ֣אֲשֵׁרִ֔ים <WH842> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֖ים <WH6456> and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכֽוֹת׃ <WH4541> and the molten images

וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <WH5422> And they brake down לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> in his presence אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִזְבְּח֣וֹת <WH4196> the altars הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <WH1168> of Baalim וְהַֽחַמָּנִ֛ים <WH2553> and the images אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> were לְמַ֥עְלָה <WH4605> that [were] on high above them מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and גִּדֵּ֑עַ <WH1438> he cut down וְ֠הָאֲשֵׁרִים <WH842> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֤ים <WH6456> and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכוֹת֙ <WH4541> and the molten images שִׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> he brake in pieces וְהֵדַ֔ק <WH1854> and made dust וַיִּזְרֹק֙ <WH2236> [of them] and strowed עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [it] upon הַקְּבָרִ֔ים <WH6913> the graves הַזֹּבְחִ֖ים <WH2076> of them that had sacrificed לָהֶֽם׃

וְעַצְמוֹת֙ <WH6106> the bones כֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests שָׂרַ֖ף <WH8313> And he burnt עַל־ <WH5921> and [מִזְבְּחֹותָים כ] (מִזְבְּחֹותָ֑ם <WH4196> altar ק) וַיְטַהֵ֥ר <WH2891> and cleansed אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem

וּבְעָרֵ֨י <WH5892> And [so did he] in the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> and Ephraim וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> and Simeon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> even unto Naphtali [בָּהַר <WH2719> dagger כ] [בָּתֵּיהֶם כ] (בְּחַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> court ק) סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיְנַתֵּ֣ץ <WH5422> And when he had broken down אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <WH4196> the altars וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֤ים <WH842> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִים֙ <WH6456> the graven images כִּתַּ֣ת <WH3807> and had beaten לְהֵדַ֔ק <WH1854> into powder וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַֽחַמָּנִ֥ים <WH2553> all the idols גִּדַּ֖ע <WH1438> and cut down בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> he returned לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס

וּבִשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year שְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> of his reign לְטַהֵ֥ר <WH2891> when he had purged הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land וְהַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> and the house שָׁ֠לַח <WH7971> he sent אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁפָ֨ן <WH8227> Shaphan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲצַלְיָ֜הוּ <WH683> of Azaliah וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֣הוּ <WH4641> and Maaseiah שַׂר־ <WH8269> the governor הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> of the city וְ֠אֵת <WH853> יוֹאָ֤ח <WH3098> and Joah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֽוֹאָחָז֙ <WH3099> of Joahaz הַמַּזְכִּ֔יר <WH2142> the recorder לְחַזֵּ֕ק <WH2388> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> And when they came אֶל־ <WH413> to חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ ׀ <WH2518> to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> the high וַֽיִּתְּנוּ֮ <WH5414> they delivered אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּסֶף֮ <WH3701> the money הַמּוּבָ֣א <WH935> that was brought בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house אֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָסְפֽוּ־ <WH622> had gathered הַלְוִיִּם֩ <WH3881> which the Levites שֹׁמְרֵ֨י <WH8104> that kept הַסַּ֜ף <WH5592> the doors מִיַּ֧ד <WH3027> of the hand מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> and Ephraim וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> and of all the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> and Benjamin [וְיֹשְׁבֵי כ] (וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH3427> abide ק) יְרֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> And they put עַל־ <WH5921> into יַד֙ <WH3027> [it] in the hand עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> that wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> and the workmen הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <WH6485> that had the oversight בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> and they gave אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> עוֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> were working הַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> and the workmen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who עֹשִׂים֙ <WH6213> were working בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִבְדּ֥וֹק <WH918> to repair וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> and amend הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> gave לֶחָֽרָשִׁים֙ <WH2796> Even to the artificers וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <WH1129> and builders לִקְנוֹת֙ <WH7069> they [it] to buy אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <WH4274> hewn וְעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> and timber לַֽמְחַבְּר֑וֹת <WH4226> for couplings וּלְקָרוֹת֙ <WH7136> and to floor אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <WH1004> the houses אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <WH7843> had destroyed מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> which the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <WH582> And the men עֹשִׂ֨ים <WH6213> did בֶּאֱמוּנָ֜ה <WH530> faithfully בַּמְּלָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> the work וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH5921> over מֻ֠פְקָדִים <WH6485> to set [it] forward יַ֣חַת <WH3189> of them [were] Jahath וְעֹבַדְיָ֤הוּ <WH5662> and Obadiah הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> the Levites מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons מְרָרִ֔י <WH4847> of Merari וּזְכַרְיָ֧ה <WH2148> and Zechariah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <WH4918> and Meshullam מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֖ים <WH6956> of the sons of the Kohathites לְנַצֵּ֑חַ <WH5329> and the overseers וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and [other of] the Levites כָּל־ <WH3605> all מֵבִ֖ין <WH995> all that could skill בִּכְלֵי־ <WH3627> of instruments שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> of musick

וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> over הַסַּבָּלִ֗ים <WH5449> Also [they were] over the bearers of burdens וּֽמְנַצְּחִים֙ <WH5329> and [were] overseers לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> of all that wrought מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work לַעֲבוֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> in any manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> to job וּמֵֽהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and of the Levites סוֹפְרִ֥ים <WH5608> [there were] scribes וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> and officers וְשׁוֹעֲרִֽים׃ <WH7778> and porters

וּבְהוֹצִיאָ֣ם <WH3318> And when they brought out אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> the money הַמּוּבָ֖א <WH935> that was brought into בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָצָא֙ <WH4672> found חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2518> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> a book תּֽוֹרַת־ <WH8451> of the law יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [given] by מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered חִלְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2518> And Hilkiah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁפָ֣ן <WH8227> to Shaphan הַסּוֹפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe סֵ֧פֶר <WH5612> the book הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <WH8451> of the law מָצָ֖אתִי <WH4672> I have found בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> delivered חִלְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2518> And Hilkiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> the book אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁפָֽן׃ <WH8227> to Shaphan

וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> carried שָׁפָ֤ן <WH8227> And Shaphan אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> the book אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וַיָּ֨שֶׁב <WH7725> back ע֧וֹד <WH5750> further אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> word לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> again saying כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> Everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was נִתַּ֥ן <WH5414> All that was committed בְּיַד־ <WH3027> to עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> thy servants הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> they do

וַיַּתִּ֕יכוּ <WH5413> And they have gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> the money הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> that was found בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּהוּ <WH5414> and have delivered עַל־ <WH5921> into יַד֙ <WH3027> it into the hand הַמֻּפְקָדִ֔ים <WH6485> of the overseers וְעַל־ <WH5921> into יַ֖ד <WH3027> and to the hand עוֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> accomplish הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> business

וַיַּגֵּ֞ד <WH5046> told שָׁפָ֤ן <WH8227> Then Shaphan הַסּוֹפֵר֙ <WH5608> the scribe לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying סֵ֚פֶר <WH5612> me a book נָ֣תַן <WH5414> hath given לִ֔י חִלְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2518> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> read ב֥וֹ שָׁפָ֖ן <WH8227> And Shaphan לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> had heard הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when the king אֵ֖ת <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> of the law וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> that he rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <WH899> his clothes

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> חִלְקִיָּ֡הוּ <WH2518> Hilkiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיקָ֣ם <WH296> and Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁ֠פָן <WH8227> of Shaphan וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּ֨וֹן <WH5658> and Abdon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָ֜ה <WH4318> of Micah וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שָׁפָ֣ן <WH8227> and Shaphan הַסּוֹפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> and Asaiah עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> a servant הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לְכוּ֩ <WH1980> Go דִרְשׁ֨וּ <WH1875> enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּעֲדִ֗י <WH1157> about וּבְעַד֙ <WH1157> about הַנִּשְׁאָר֙ <WH7604> for me and for them that are left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> in Israel וּבִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and in Judah עַל־ <WH5921> concerning דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> concerning the words הַסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> of the book אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> that is found כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גְדוֹלָ֤ה <WH1419> for great חֲמַת־ <WH2534> [is] the wrath יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִתְּכָ֣ה <WH5413> that is poured out בָ֔נוּ עַל֩ <WH5921> concerning אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמְר֤וּ <WH8104> have not kept אֲבוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> upon us because our fathers אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> after all that is written עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַסֵּ֥פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went חִלְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH2518> And Hilkiah וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and whom הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> and [they] that the king אֶל־ <WH413> to חֻלְדָּ֨ה <WH2468> to Huldah הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <WH5031> the prophetess אֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH802> the wife שַׁלֻּ֣ם <WH7967> of Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [תֹּוקְהַת כ] (תָּקְהַ֗ת <WH8445> border ק) בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חַסְרָה֙ <WH2641> of Hasrah שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> keeper הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> of the wardrobe וְהִ֛יא <WH1931> she יוֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> (now she dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem בַּמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <WH4932> the Second וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> spoke אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> about כָּזֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise ס

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she answered לָהֶ֔ם כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> Tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ye the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> that sent אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about ס

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> Behold I will bring רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יוֹשְׁבָ֑יו <WH3427> and upon the inhabitants אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָלוֹת֙ <WH423> thereof [even] all the curses הַכְּתוּב֣וֹת <WH3789> that are written עַל־ <WH5921> in הַסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> in the book אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which קָֽרְא֔וּ <WH7121> which they have read לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

תַּ֣חַת ׀ <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they עֲזָב֗וּנִי <WH5800> Because they have forsaken [וַיַּקְטִירוּ כ] (וַֽיְקַטְּרוּ֙ <WH6999> burn incense ק) לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> might הַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <WH3707> that they might provoke me to anger בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> with all the works יְדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3027> of their hands וְתִתַּ֧ךְ <WH5413> shall be poured out חֲמָתִ֛י <WH2534> therefore my wrath בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <WH3518> and shall not be quenched

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king בֵּית־ <WH1004> into the house יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and all the men יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people מִגָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> great וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קָטָ֑ן <WH6996> and small וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and he read בְאָזְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH241> in their ears אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> all the words סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> of the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> that was found בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
